comment: If any representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` has a certain property ` ps ` , then any structure with base set ` V ` and value ` E ` in the slot for edge functions (which is such a representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` ) has this property.
